books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.name: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: A recovering alcoholic puts herself in danger when she searches for a Haitian teenager in a Boston neighborhood.
books.name: BEFORE SHE DISAPPEARED

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Ashley Audrain
books.description: A devastating event forces a mother who questions her child’s behavior and her own sanity to confront the truth.
books.name: THE PUSH

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A Hollywood recluse’s perspective changes when she invites her neighbors into her mansion after an earthquake.
books.name: NEIGHBORS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A friendship between two women in the Pacific Northwest endures for more than three decades.
books.name: FIREFLY LANE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.name: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.
books.name: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: The second book in the Nora Kelly series. An F.B.I. agent and an archaeologist identify a mummified corpse and its gruesome cause of death.
books.name: THE SCORPION'S TAIL

books.author: by Paulette Jiles
books.description: Following the Civil War, a man who reads newspapers to paying audiences agrees to deliver an orphan girl across difficult terrain to her relatives.
books.name: NEWS OF THE WORLD

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE
